Rishabh Tiwari

Google Research India

Google AI Research Lab

rishabhtiwari@google.com

I am a Pre-Doctoral Researcher at Google Research working with Dr. Pradeep Shenoy on developing robust and efficient deep learning. My recent work involves mitigating simplicity bias without using bias labels, network architecture optimization by developing novel network pruning algorithm.

I am also a founding member and senior researcher at Transmute AI Labs, a non profit research lab, where I guide undergrad students to pursue research.

For updated details, please see my Google Scholar / Google Research Website / LinkedIn pages.
